name_jp: 世界をマリー色に染めちゃうYo！
description_jp: 次に発動するSP特技で獲得するボルテージが自身のテクニックの31.5%増加
description_en: The Voltage gained from the next SP Skill increases by 31.5% of own Technique

effect.display: Gain 31.5% of Technique as extra Voltage on next SP skill
effect.formatting: Gain {effect} of Technique as extra Voltage on next SP skill
